_json.gridTitle: The Chew: Carla Hall and Mario Batali's Squash Soup & White Bean Soup
_json.description: Carla Hall and Mario Batali's & Fava Bean SoupCarla Hall White Bean Soup Ingredients     For the Pistou:     2 cups fresh Basil leaves     1/4 cup freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano     1 Garlic clove     Salt and Pepper to taste     1 teaspoon Red Chili Flakes     1/3 cup Extra Virgin Oilve Oil      For the Soup:     1/2 pound Pancetta (medium dice)     3 tablespoons Extra Virgin Olive Oil     1 large Onion (chopped)     1 medium Celery Root (peeled and cut into 1/2-inch dice)     4 Garlic cloves (sliced)     3 Thyme sprigs (leaves torn)     3 14-ounce cans fava Beans (rinsed)     Salt and Pepper to taste     6 cups Chicken Stock  The Chew White Bean Soup Directions:      In a mortar and pestle, mash together the ingredients for the pistou until well blended.     In a large dutch oven, cook the pancetta for about 5 minutes to render out some of the fat. Turn the heat to medium-high and cook until deliciously crispy.     Add onion and celery root and salt. Saute over medium-high heat for about 2 to 3 minutes. Add garlic, thyme, pepper and beans.     Add stock, bring to a boil, cook for 25 to 30 minutes, until the soup is thick.     Remove from heat. Serve with pistou and cheese.
